New Rooftop Playground On São Paulo

Location: São Paulo, Brazil
Date: 5/29/2024
Application: playground

Project Overview

Check out the first installation of Rosehill TPV® by Playtime | Playgrounds at a residential building in São Paulo, Brazil. This playspace features a range of coloured Rosehill rubber granules, creating a vibrant softfall surface that provides protection against slips, trips, and falls.Rosehill TPV® is a high-quality rubber surfacing solution, manufactured in the UK and distributed worldwide for creating softfall surfaces in any climate. With unbeatable UV stability, these surfaces are long-lasting and safe for playgrounds, fitness areas, and more, retaining their colour and softness years after installation.Thanks to Playtime | Playgrounds and TPV Color Brazil – https://tpvcolor.com.br/

Ready to Transform Your Space?

Contact us today to discuss how Rosehill TPV® can create safe, vibrant surfaces for your project.
